overview: Max Bogretsov joined EPAM in 1997 as a Sr. Technical Manager. Since then he has distinguished himself at multiple mission-critical software development projects delivered to the EPAM clients. During his tenure as EPAM’s Director of Software Engineering and then as Vice President of Technology Solutions, he has refined project and resource management processes to conform to industry best practices for efficiency, accountability and quality. Today Max is responsible for orchestrating distributed delivery process among the EPAM offshore software development centers to insure successful client implementations.

relationships.title: Senior Vice President of technology Solutions
